properties.areaDesc: Western/Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 7:52PM MST until March 2 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, briefly heavy at times, expected. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, with locally higher amounts
possible.

* WHERE...Fremont County Below 8500 Feet, El Paso County.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and icy road conditions with
significantly reduced visibility at times. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavier bands of snow are expected at times
tonight, with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour. The
bands of snow may produce highly varying snow amounts, and road
conditions. Patchy blowing snow will also be possible. Lastly,
a small window of patchy freezing drizzle or freezing rain may
occur after the snow ends early Monday morning.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM MST MONDAY
